task.title: How To Connect to Virginia Tech Wifi

context.p: The deskptop computers located in Shanks 180 & 360 are already connected to Virginia Tech's on-campus wireless internet. If you are bringing additional technology such as smart phones, laptops, tablets, etc., you will need to use these instructions to connect those devices to Virginia Tech wifi.

step.cmd: Open a webpage in a browser such as Safari, Firefox, Google Chrome, Internet Explorer, etc.
If you do not have an account, select Create a new guest account.
If you were given a guest wireless account, select Login to guest wireless.
Follow the procedures on the screen to complete the login processes.
